title: Templates & Forms
description: The following protocol and consent templates are used by researchers in preparation for IRB submission (see Investigator Manual (download) for additional guidance on completing these documents). Additional IRB templates are provided to promote transparency of IRB operations. HIPAA and data use agreements are not part of the Toolkit and can be found in the Contracts Library.
cleaned_text: The following protocol and consent templates are used by researchers in preparation for IRB submission (see [Investigator Manual (download)](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-103_-_investigator_manual_google_doc.pdf) for additional guidance on completing these documents). Additional IRB templates are provided to promote transparency of IRB operations. HIPAA and data use agreements are not part of the Toolkit and can be found in the [Contracts Library](https://policy.umn.edu/contracts/other#41). Download Frequently Accessed Forms & Templates: [503: Human Research Determination Form](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-503_-_human_research_determination_form.docx) [590: Medical Research](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-592-template-biomedical-consent-form.docx) [588: Consent](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-588-_template_-_combined_hipaa_and_consent.docx) [582: Consent Form Research](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-582-template-social-behavioral-consent-form.docx) [507: Consent Short Form Template Form](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-216_-_form_-_external_team_member_form.doc) Protocols - Addendum - No Instructions (download)](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-508_-_local_protocol_addendum_no_instructions.docx) [Social Template Protocol - With Instructions (download)](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-580_-_social_template_protocol_-_with_instructions.docx) [Social Template Protocol - No Instructions (download)](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-580_-_social_template_protocol_no_instructions.docx) [Medical Template Protocol - With Instructions (download)](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-590_-_medical_template_protocol_-_with_instructions.docx) [Medical Template Protocol - No Instructions (download)](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-590_-_medical_template_protocol_-_no_instructions.docx) [Data or Other |504|| of Report (download)](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-520_-_letter_-_external_report.doc) [CoC Assurance Letter (download)](/sites/research.umn.edu/files/hrp-543_-_letter_-_coc_assurance_letter.docx) Share feedback or suggestions regarding how to improve these Toolkit documents, including the protocol and consent templates: [HRPP Toolkit Feedback Form](https://docs.google.com/a/umn.edu/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdpP0EjizttfwahcTZhjfY5ElUTpMWHxoTwcDo58kBZEJR2Jw/viewform). Forms IRB staff and members use these documents as a reference when reviewing IRB submissions.
